title: darishanam tandE aruLinEn
sahitya:
darishana tandE aruLinAn tAmE nikhilamenadAm OdiyapaDitA-mOna aruLai 
dAmOdara hari tAm Arena varum nArada mAmuni tAm uyyavenru tAm meyya ninru


anupallavi

  parijanamuLLa padinAyiram ennum patnigaL mA manaiyE paramAna 
vaikuNTham Akkit-tanit-taniyAi pagirndu irundu mAdhavan tanaiyE 


caraNam 1    toNDar kula aravinda malaraDiyai tozhudu koNDu tuyil ezhundaruLap-pADa 
tumburu matanga shuka saunaka munivarum shruti izhaittaruL bhUpALam pADa
paNDanaiya vEdam pADum maraiyavargaL pangu pOTTamaLI aruginil kUDa adaip-
pArtta nAradarum shruti shErtta tandiyilE pATTonru pADa sEvittu ODa 
    caraNam 2    aDutta manaiyil aDi vaittiDa veghu azhagiya dantam tulakkubavanAgha 
maDutta paNNishaiyODarugu uLLa mangaLa yamunai nIr AduvAnAga 
viDutta oru manaiyil agnihOtramum vEroru manaiyil pArAyaNa shAstramum 
koDutta dAnamum dharmamum kaNDAl kubEran ayyanukku mun emmAttiram
    caraNam 3    ODi vandu nArada svAmi varavENum nAm ingE kANum uvandu 
aDiyEn tarum upacArattai uLam kuLirndu koNDu ETRiDa vENDum
aDI jAmbavatI vandu pAru ingE yArivar teriyumO nAradar tAnaDi
arumaiyAghap-pADuvAr avar pATTukku aDimaiyAnEnaDi AmAnaDi ena
    caraNam 4    marai oli paraviDa avaniyil vandaruLi ninru kurai Edenak-kETTa 
mAdhavan tirumalar vadanam adai nOkki marumozhi uttavan punnakai pUkka
kuraivilAda kurai adutAn kurai ena kumuda malarndadu pOlaruL nOkka
koNDADi nAradar munnOrai nOkka kumbiTTu innoru manai vazhi pArkka
    caraNam 5    gandharvar kinnarar vidyAdharar kavigaLum mannargaL pulavargaL shUzha 
gaddiyam kUrum bANargaL nAradarai kaNDomenak-kUra sabhaiyellAm Ezha
sonda nAradarai kaNDu uravADi konjam avaippaNNai ishaiyum enattAzha
toTTa mUrccanaiyil sabhAS sabhAS ena sokkina sabhaitOruDan tAnum shUzha
    caraNam 6    parimArina kaiyODu veLi vandu paNNUru munivOr tozhuda kai pattu 
bhAgyam aduvum kai mEl adu umai pArttu nALAccu ena urai muDittu 
karikaiyuDan veghu urimai koNDu muni karam aNaittu kara karavenrittu
kAdalODu amara vaittu annam kaniyODu parimArina kari varadan
    caraNam 7    candanam koDuttadoru vIDu tAmbUlam aLittadoru vIDu 
vandanam aLittadoru vIDu athitiyAi azhaittadoru vIDu
sundaramAghavum pATTu kETTu uLam sokkinadAnadu oru vIDu
turiya vIDu adu peria vIDu tiru dvArakai muzhudum hari vIDu enru
    caraNam 8    nIrADinadoru vIDu siruvaroDu pOrADinadoru vIDu piLLai 
pOrADinadoru vIDu manaiyALuDanE pEshuvadoru vIDu
ErALamAghina pulavaruk-kellAm iru kaiyum pOrAdu koDuttadoru vIDu
Ingumoru kaNNan angumoru kaNNan ingumangum oru kaNNan enra oru vIDu
